column3: School of Architecture, Computing and Engineering
column5: This programme is designed for those who want to pursue a career in Artificial Intelligence (specialising in machine learning and deep learning), developing smart and insightful software agents/algorithms that can help business decision making and strategic planning for any organisation. The programme provides students with the deeper knowledge and advanced skills that will allow them to contribute to the development and design of machine learning automation and predictive modelling. The programme uses a series of face-to-face lectures, workshops and lab-based learning as a way of securing a knowledge base; whereas other teaching methods, practical sessions, seminars and reflection of work-based practice to enforce learning and professional skills are also used.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
